form_description: Thank you for cooperating with our product recall process. Please fill out the following information so we can assist you accordingly.

fields.name: Product Model
fields.description: Please confirm the model of the product you purchased

fields.name: Product ID
fields.description: Product identifier, can be found on the product packaging

fields.name: Current Product Status
fields.description: Please select the current status of the product

fields.name: Return Preference
fields.description: Please select your preferred resolution option

fields.name: Problem Description
fields.description: Please describe in detail the issues you encountered with the product or any other relevant information

fields.name: Agreement to Terms of Processing
fields.description: I agree to proceed according to the recall processing procedure
